title: Ohio Farms Packing Co. Ltd. Recalls Veal Products Due To Possible E. Coli O103 Contamination
summary: WASHINGTON, March 2, 2017 Ohio Farms Packing Co. Ltd., a Creston, Ohio establishment, is recalling approximately 40,680 pounds of boneless veal products that may be contaminated with E. coli O103, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. Also included...

establishment.name: Ohio Farms Packing Co. Ltd.
establishment.address:
2416 E. West Salem Rd. 
  Creston, OH 44217

impacted_products: 60-lb boxes of “Atlantic Veal & Lamb Inc.: Boneless Veal SF” with product codes
